bibl.title: Cleopatra II and III: The Queens of Ptolemy VI and VIII as Guarantors of Kingship and Rivals for Power.
bibl.note: Introduction. - Principal changes under Cleopatra I. - Cleopatra II and Ptolemy VI. - Cleopatra II with Ptolemy VI and VIII. - Cleopatra II and Ptolemy VI. - Cleopatra II and Ptolemy VIII. - Cleopatra II and Cleopatra III with Ptolemy VIII. - Cleopatra III after the death of Cleopatra II. - Conclusion.

bibl.title: Ägypten zwischen innerem Zwist und äusserem Druck. Die Zeit Ptolemaios' VI. bis VIII. Internationales Symposion Heidelberg 16.-19.9.2007.

bibl.seg: MlNAS-NERPEL Martina, Cleopatra II and III: The Queens of Ptolemy VI and VIII as Guarantors of Kingship and Rivals for Power.

Andrea JÖRDENS und Joachim Friedrich QUACK (Hgg.), Ägypten zwischen innerem Zwist und äusserem Druck. Die Zeit Ptolemaios' VI. bis VIII. Internationales Symposion Heidelberg 16.-19.9.2007 = Philippika. Marburger altertumskundliche Abhandlungen. 45 (Wiesbaden, 2011) pp. 58-76, 7 figg.
